unnormalised: Yeah, finding that office was a pain! It's at 27, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, 400050. Landmark is near that famous chai stall, you know, the one opp. Shoppers Stop. If you're coming by auto, tell them "Linking Road ka chai stall, near the Bata showroom", they all know it. Good luck finding parking though, it's usually jam-packed!
normalised: Yeah, finding that office was a pain! It is at twenty seven, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty. Landmark is near that famous chai stall, you know, the one opposite Shoppers Stop. If you are coming by auto, tell them "Linking Road ka chai stall, near the Bata showroom", they all know it. Good luck finding parking though, it is usually jam-packed!
